item.title: 盈利前景是投资者的下一个痛点
item.description:
分析师已经开始削减 2025 年的预期

。【原文：

Analysts have already started cutting their 2025 estimates

】

item.title: 关税动荡导致 IPO 推迟，硅谷笼罩在恐慌之中
item.description:
科技风险投资阶层一直寄希望于上市企业在2025年卷土重来。【原文：

Tech’s venture capital class had been banking on a 2025 comeback for public listings.

】

item.title: 多伦多 Tailscale 获得新融资，估值达到 15 亿美元
item.description: 总部位于多伦多的安全初创公司 Tailscale Inc.已从投资者那里筹集到 1.6 亿美元，这对这家加拿大公司来说是一笔巨额资金。据一位不愿透露姓名的知情人士透露，这笔交易对这家初创公司的估值为 15 亿美元。【原文：Tailscale Inc., a security startup based in Toronto, has raised $160 million from investors — a significant haul for the Canadian company. The deal values the startup at $1.5 billion according to a person familiar with the matter who asked not to be identified discussing private information.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚总理任命提格雷州新领导人以缓和紧张局势
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚任命塔德塞-沃雷德（Tadesse Worede）为提格雷大区临时主席，以缓和这个北部动荡省份的紧张局势。【原文：Ethiopia appointed Tadesse Worede as interim president of the Tigray region in a bid to defuse tensions in the restive northern province.】

item.title: 欧洲央行西姆库斯呼吁在美国关税打击后于 4 月降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员格迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税攻势，欧洲中央银行下周应降低利率。【原文：The European Central Bank should lower interest rates next week because of US President Donald Trump’s tariff offensive, according to Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus.】

item.title: 华尔街为贸易战导致的企业盈利下滑做好准备
item.description: 受唐纳德-特朗普总统关税影响的美国股市本周晚些时候将面临另一个重大考验：企业盈利。而它们的前景并不乐观。【原文：US stocks reeling from the impact of President Donald Trump’s tariffs face another big test starting later this week: corporate earnings. And they’re not looking good.】

item.title: 据说 SBI 正在考虑出售加密货币部门 B2C2 的少数股权
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，日本金融服务集团 SBI 控股公司（SBI Holdings Inc.【原文：A unit of Japanese financial services conglomerate SBI Holdings Inc. is exploring selling a minority stake in cryptocurrency market maker B2C2, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度国家领导人表示，印度金融中心将经受住关税风暴的考验
item.description: 马哈拉施特拉邦首席部长周二在印度全球论坛上表示，尽管关税声明引发了全球动荡，但投资者仍然看好马哈拉施特拉邦。【原文：Investors remain bullish on Maharashtra despite the global turmoil caused by the tariff announcements, the state’s chief minister said Tuesday at the India Global Forum.】

item.title: 日本民主党领袖提出：若关税抑制经济，日本央行将降息
item.description: 日本一个主要反对党的领导人表示，日本央行可能不得不扭转政策方向，不仅搁置任何加息的想法，而且还准备在美国关税损害经济的情况下考虑下调基准利率。【原文：The leader of a key opposition party in Japan said the central bank may have to reverse course on policy, not only putting aside any notions of hiking interest rates but also being prepared to mull a cut to the benchmark if US tariffs damage the economy.】

item.title: 米莱伊试图抹去阿根廷历史以吸引外国投资
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）在将这个南美国家重新打造为自由市场天堂的过程中，正试图铲除阿根廷主要的民粹主义流派--庇隆主义（Peronism）的一切残余。【原文：Javier Milei is trying to stamp out every vestige of Peronism, Argentina’s dominant strain of populism, in his re-branding of the South American nation as a free-market haven.】

item.title: 乌克兰计划派特使赴美就矿产交易举行会谈
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，乌克兰官员将于本周末访问美国，就有关战后开采矿藏和重建基础设施计划的协议进行会谈。【原文：Ukrainian officials will visit the US at the end of this week for talks on a deal governing post-war plans to exploit mineral deposits and rebuild infrastructure, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行文件称瑞士黄金转口扭曲了美国贸易顺差
item.description: 瑞士国家银行（Swiss National Bank）的一份文件指出，在分析瑞士和美国的贸易关系时，不应将瑞士对美国的黄金出口额计算在内。【原文：Switzerland’s outsized gold exports to the US shouldn’t be included when analyzing the trade relationship between both economies, according to a paper from the Swiss National Bank.】

item.title: 游说团体称德国债务一揽子计划将增加 10 亿欧元银行收入
item.description: 由于政府计划增加国防和基础设施开支，德国金融业每年将增加 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）的收入。【原文：Germany’s finance industry will see €1 billion ($1.1 billion) in additional revenues a year as a result of the government’s plan to boost spending on defense and infrastructure.】

item.title: 逊菲尔德在上周的动荡中获益，花旗国躲过一劫
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的关税大棒引发的全球股市动荡中，Schonfeld Strategic Advisors 取得了微弱的收益，而其他大型跨国对冲基金则避开了最严重的混乱局面。【原文：Schonfeld Strategic Advisors delivered modest gains amid the global stock-market upheaval unleashed by President Donald Trump’s tariff barrage while other large multistrategy hedge funds avoided the worst of the chaos.】

item.title: 监管机构称瑞银投资银行上限将受到欢迎
item.description: 瑞士金融监管机构负责人表示，他赞成瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）限制其投资银行规模的提议，这为有关瑞士最大贷款机构未来资本要求的讨论指明了一条潜在的前进道路。【原文：The head of Switzerland’s financial watchdog signaled he’s in favor of UBS Group AG’s offer to limit the size of its investment bank, indicating a potential way forward in the debate about future capital requirements on the country’s largest lender.】

item.title: 中国股票风险溢价创历史新高，预示国企收购前景良好
item.description: 在目前的水平上，中国的国有基金几乎不可能买入优质股票，因为企业的薪酬高于无风险利率，达到了历史最高水平。【原文：China’s state funds are hardly likely to be burnt buying a gauge of quality stocks at its present level, with firms’ payouts over risk-free rates at the highest on record.】

item.title: 科维德时代的相似性预示着全球股市未来将面临更多痛苦
item.description: 目前全球急于退出股票，保住资本以应对政策的不确定性，这与科维德时代的大跌有很多共同之处。【原文：The ongoing global rush to exit stocks and preserve capital against policy uncertainty has a lot in common with the Covid-era selloff.】

item.title: 高盛警告熊市来临，贝莱德下调美股评级
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发动贸易战的背景下，华尔街的策略师们对股市前景发出了越来越多的警告。【原文：Warnings from Wall Street strategists are piling up on the dour outlook for stocks amid President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 泛欧交易所首席执行官称投资者因不确定性将黄金撤出美国
item.description: 泛欧交易所（Euronext NV）首席执行官史蒂芬-布杰纳（Stephane Boujnah）说，一些欧洲投资者对特朗普政府的贸易政策感到不安，他们开始将黄金转移出美国。【原文：Euronext NV Chief Executive Officer Stephane Boujnah said some European investors are so unsettled by the trade policies of the Trump administration they are starting to move gold out of the US.】

item.title: 全球游客正在重新考虑赴美度假计划
item.description:
随着有关拘留和驱逐出境的轶事不断传出，早期迹象表明，欧洲人和加拿大人的消费下滑令人担忧。【原文：

As anecdotes of detentions and deportations reverberate, early signs point to a worrying spending slump from Europeans and Canadians.

】

item.title: 女性蛋白质需求撼动千亿美元营养市场
item.description: 蓬勃发展的健康热潮和日益增多的瘦身针剂为蛋白奶昔制造商带来了一个全新的机遇：更多的女性客户。【原文：A blossoming wellness boom and growing uptake of slimming injections are opening a brand new opportunity for protein shake makers: more female customers.】

item.title: 欧盟将在关税动荡中发行 70 亿欧元两部分债券
item.description: 在投资者消化美国关税带来的动荡之际，欧盟将于周二在一级债券市场融资 70 亿欧元（77 亿美元），重新开放现有的两只债券。【原文：The European Union is looking to raise €7 billion ($7.7 billion) in the primary bond market on Tuesday, reopening two of its existing securities as investors digest the upheaval stemming from US tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普下令挖掘煤炭资源，以求在人工智能领域占据主导地位
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）正着手扩大美国境内煤炭的开采和使用，为能源需求旺盛的数据中心提供动力，同时寻求重振日益衰落的美国化石燃料行业。【原文：President Donald Trump is moving to expand the mining and use of coal inside the US, a bid to power the boom in energy-hungry data centers while seeking to revive a declining US fossil fuel industry.】

item.title: 欧洲股市在经历 2020 年以来最严重的四天下跌后反弹
item.description: 受美国加征关税的影响，欧洲股市周二出现反弹，创下自 19 世纪科维德大流行以来最严重的四天跌幅。【原文：European stocks rebounded on Tuesday following the worst four-day drop since the Covid-19 pandemic in the wake of US tariffs.】

item.title: 印度水泥生产商努沃科寻求私人贷款进行收购
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大的水泥生产商之一 Nuvoco Vistas 股份有限公司正在寻求约 1.4 亿美元的私人贷款，以支持其收购竞争对手 Vadraj 水泥有限公司。【原文：Nuvoco Vistas Corporation Ltd., among India’s largest cement makers, is seeking a private loan of about $140 million to back its purchase of rival, Vadraj Cement Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 击败 90% 同行的基金经理认为欧洲股市将遭受更多冲击
item.description: 在投资者试图评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税将对全球经济造成何种伤害之际，欧洲股市的溃败远未结束。【原文：The rout in European equities is far from over as investors try to assess just how US President Donald Trump’s tariffs will hurt the global economy.】

item.title: 保时捷全球销量下滑，中国和德国市场下滑居首
item.description: 由于中国和德国市场的大幅下滑盖过了美国市场的增长，保时捷第一季度的全球交付量下降了 8%。【原文：Porsche AG’s global deliveries fell 8% in the first quarter as steep declines in China and Germany overshadowed gains in the US.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴利用最新的 Qwen 模型升级国际人工智能工具
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）在周二举行的春季发布会上表示，该公司的云计算部门正在升级面向国际客户的人工智能工具套件和基础设施产品。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s cloud division is upgrading its suite of artificial intelligence tools and infrastructure offerings for international customers, the company said at its Spring Launch event on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本太空初创公司达成购买美国制造火箭发动机的协议
item.description: 一家日本太空初创公司正在购买美国制造的火箭发动机，用于其小型可重复使用运载火箭，以弥补日本大规模卫星生产与有限的太空发射机会之间的差距。【原文：A Japanese space startup is buying US-made rocket engines for use with its small, reusable launch vehicles in a bid to bridge the gap between the country’s large-scale satellite production and its limited access to space launches.】

item.title: 特朗普驳斥欧盟阻止关税生效的最后努力
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）拒绝了欧盟提出的取消与美国所有双边工业品贸易关税的建议，这意味着他对欧盟所有进口商品征收的 20% 关税将于周三生效。【原文：President Donald Trump rejected a European Union proposal to drop tariffs on all bilateral trade in industrial goods with the US, meaning that his 20% tariff on all EU imports is due to come into force Wednesday.】
